name: Extremely Short Wine Tycoon
description:
Made for Xander Jam 5

Instructions in game, all controlled with mouse.

M to mute.

Backspace to skip to the end if you can't wait 10 minutes.

Tab to quit to main menu (THIS HAS NO CONFIRMATION AND WILL ERASE YOUR PROGRESS)

You can buy upgrades for your zones by clicking the + icon next to each zone if you have the amount of money displayed below the icon.

Post your score below if you finish!

---

Had to rush and cut a lot of stuff for this due to being very busy with school. May update if I get more time. And I hope you get at the very least 5 seconds of entertainment out of this :)
